author: carmen Morales

comment:
Oh Thank you so much for Posting this very heartfelt and compassionate message from the Brilliant Johnny Depp 💗 His words bring me great solace and comfort. I climb into johnnys voice and feel peaceful, warm and safe ~ his spirit soothes me so! These really are some of the toughest times ever. I feel very alone and isolated. Though I am fortunate in many ways I do live a life in almost total seclusion. My family has completely deserted me. I feel very often as if I live on an Island of 2-just me and my dog-and my Mom who loved me dearly and my Granny have passed away some years ago 😢 So here I am cast out by a family who I sincerely believe just pretends I have already died 😢 it's a very terrible feeling to know they don't care. 
So I turn to the Love and Positivity that Thankfully is out here on YouTube with so many kind people.
These Sweet messages  comfort me A LOT when I feel SO alone and to help me hold on and yes, to remember not to give in to boredom! To be Creative and make use of this time as Johnny says. I just have to say that every single time I have tried to explain to any Therapist that self-isolation is a strengthening part of my life-very important to me. I get railed on by all of them. I say, "I'm a true Introvert. I am my best self at home where I feel Safe." and it somehow always turns into me getting taken apart and torn down for the real person that is in my Soul.
It is a refreshing thing to hear someone say that staying in and self-isolating can be healing-at least that's what I think I got from Mr. Depp's words.
Thank You for the great message! God's Greatest Blessings & Wild Irish Blessings to Johnny Depp. He sincerely Loves the world and all of us, and in return Johnny is SO Very Dearly and Greatly LOVED 💗😘🌷 Je'taimes Johnny 💝

comment: I often try to bring up in conversation the insanity of our existence in this world and how amazing it is that each of us came to be and how improbable but beautiful it is that we simply are. How we live , eat breathe, feel, think thoughts of our own and have a consciousness so that we may experience this world while trying to connect to others, how the earth we live on operates is so curious such as the simple fact that water has many forms and how laws of physics and nature work in harmony and balance yet they have do much mystery, science vs math(and so on). Yet I am always told I think too much and that I over sensationalize "simple" things Iike the fact that we exist, and that only people under some sort of influence think the way I do. But I know there are people out there who think the way I do in full sobriety, and I feel that Johnny might be one of those people and that would be beautiful, it would be a dream to have a simple conversation with him but I will have to make do with watching whatever content he releases to the internet ❤️

author: Darla B

comment:
Amber Heard isn’t just a psycho, she’s an idiot. Johnny Depp is kind, cool, fun, genuine, generous, intelligent, interesting, talented. Funny. Good looking. He’s literally the perfect man (in spite of what many people see as his flaws - partying and stuff. I just think all that makes him seem more fun and real). She used him, belittled him, made fun of him behind his back, degraded him, took him for granted. He’s always been a million times better than her in every way - she was blessed and she didn’t even notice. Not just that, she actively destroyed what could have been an amazing life with an amazing person. What a moron. I can only dream of finding someone to love, and who loves me, with all the aforementioned qualities. They’re so rare in this world, I’ll probably never even cross paths with someone like that, let alone have the opportunity to love and be loved by them.  What a moron she is. 

She undervalued him, overvalued herself, and misjudged everyone’s gullibility. 

She deserves prison. Let her pay for her violence and her crimes by staying away from other people (because she is clearly a violent and dangerous person), and spending the rest of her life reflecting on everything she had that she didn’t appreciate, and all the terrible things she did to everyone around her. The hate the public has for her is her own fault entirely. I suspect she is the most despised woman in the world - everyone dislikes her. She is loathed across cultures, countries, age groups, gender. It doesn’t matter what people’s culture is, what their politics are, their religion or ideology - everyone wants to see justice for Johnny, because we see the evidence through her lies.

Amber, I hope you reflect on how you had everything, and your own awful behaviour has left you with nothing. And when you think about this, I hope you begin to take responsibility for your own actions....because you wholly deserve everything coming to you.

And Johnny, I know that she told you you were worthless, and washed up, and old, and ugly, that you were the one in the wrong...but this is what abusers do. They scapegoat, project, and gaslight the people they hurt. I’ve been through it myself - it is frustrating and heartbreaking, but you will get through it. Many of us have been through the same thing, and we are all here for you. Know that nothing she told you was true...but we are telling the truth when we say we admire and respect you, and lend you our support. Thanks for being one of those rare people in the world who has all the aforementioned qualities - and never let someone like her change that.
author: Just Another Happy Humanist

comment: I know there are horrible things going on in the world and in the US but as my heart aches for the ppl who are going through hell and pain in this life my heart also aches for Johnny.  I am 41 yrs old and remember rushing home from school to see him in 21 Jump Street and watched all of his movies I could tell he is a sensitive and beautiful person inside and out. This video proves how pure his heart is.  I want to hug him and tell him that he is loved the world over and everything good he gets in this life he truly deserves. As a woman ppl think that ALL women should stick together and denounce dv but sometimes the woman IS the abuser.  I tried to see her side many times but in my heart I can’t accept that he is an abuser.  He may have had drug and alcohol addiction. Maybe he has hit her but from the evidence I’ve seen it looks like self defense.  Nobody is perfect and the only crime I see that this beautiful soul has done is love a very mean manipulating woman that destroyed his heart and soul and has tainted the #METOO Movement   I will probably get some hate from this post but I truly do not care.  It’s just how I feel.  God broke the mold when he created Johnny Depp.  And it’s hard to find such beautiful souls like him in this shitty world but there are a few out there.  #TEAMJOHNNY

comment: YEPPP! I told you I get long-winded...and there's more on my heart I want you know IF ever you do get to see and read 📖 my thoughts 💭 here one day! We are Gemini's and know that only your heart ♥ is whyyyy I have SOOO much to sayyyy and KNOWING I'VE BEEN THERE AND KNOW WHAT YOU BEEN THROUGH  and know you can trust me and while you may think 🤔 this fan is nutty but nurturing in her own Mawma Bear 🐻 wayyy...she only wants to be supportive and nothing else...nothing more nothing less! ❤️ ❣️ I promise! But BEING THERE IN SHOES ONCE UPON A TIME of you ever need a friend to talk to that COMPLETELY HAS UNDERSTANDING and COMPASSIONATE and SYMPATHETIC nothing more nothing less I am here and feel free to call me just to talk to someone 9416262318 and happy to be a listening ear or a  shoulder! ❤️ ❣️ I'm a nobody special just very well experienced of the horrific madness you have been through AND ANY TIME YOUUU SHOULD CALL IT WILL ALWAYS BE REMAINED QUIET AND CONFIDENTIAL AND NEVER DISCUSS ANYTHING WITH ANOTHER LIVING SOUL AND NO DIFFERNENTLY THAN AS IT WOULD BE BETWEEN A DR AND PATIENT OR A LAWYER AND HIS CLIENT...I was bullied horribly in my elementary school years it was horrible even then growing up but at least I got called names from the wonderful Walt Disney characters...and was always there to stick up for those who couldn't fight off their bullies and didn't care if they took out on me their rage I was strong and roughed skinned and knew it wasn't going to hurt me if they did! But one day in 7th grade a girl came into class crying and I took her out into the hallway and when our teacher came out Mr. BROOKS I said we're right here and we won't be joining your class today! I spent the whole class period talking with her THE NEXT DAY I entered homeroom and overnight went being bullied and picked on horrendously to being the MOST POPULAR KID ON CAMPAS AND BEING CALLED Dr. Yerian (my maiden name)...AND EVERYBODY came to me to cry on my shoulder and find advice and clarity and help! Tho I never finished school and also dropped out two weeks before I turned 16 yrs old due to a girl that joined the school right after Christmas break was jealous and was mean and nasty as hell to me and she was physically abusive with me...I NEVER SAID A WORD BUT SHE WANTED TO BE THE MOST POPULAR GIRL SOMEHOW FELT I WAS, as my locker was OVER SPILLING WITH NOTES and kids even 12th graders would come to my classes or lunch break  and call me out into the halls to talk and seek advice and to this day still have a few/ some of those notes so Dr. Yerian never made it any further than ninth and tenth grade I was doubling up when I quit and dropped out well 2 weeks before my 16th Birthday this student tried to trip on the second floor cement steps as I was coming down she was coming up the stairs and she tripped me and I TORE BACK UP THOSE STAIRS with my forearm up against her chest slammed up against the lockers while her two girlfriends just stood there...and my finger pointed in her face I STAMMERED to her YOUUU EVER TOUCH ME AGAIN I'LL THROW YOUUU DOWN THOSE STAIRS AND SEE HOW YOU LIKE IT STAY THE BLOODY HELL AWAYYYY FROM ME OR I SWEAR I'LL ALL BUT KILL YOUUU IF YOU EVER TOUCH ME AGAIN! I'VE HAD IT AND HAD ENOUGH OF CRAP DON'T TOUCH ME AGAIN! She is asking her friends at this time, "Are you going to just let her do that to me? " They back up with their hands in the air and said this isn't our fight we're not apart of this and don't want any part of that...when I let her go she slumped down right down to the floor NOT realizing I had her feet dangling a foot off the floor I didn't even know my own strength and yes I worked on a farm and threw 100 lb bails of hay every day for years so I didn't know that she was dangling off the floor and I left school KNOWING I COULD NEVER FACE HER AGAIN FOR FEAR OF HURTING AND HARMING HER CUZZ I REALLY WANTED TO THROW HER OVER THE BANISTER RAILINGS OVER THE STAIRS AND KNEW I WOULD SERIOUSLY FEEL HORRIBLE IF I HURT HER I HAD NO INTENTIONS OF KILLING HER BY ANY MEANS...SOOO I never went back to school after that day! But years later she showed up at my brother's house when I was there babysitting and she came around the back side and stopped dead in her tracks and I stood there and very nicely and calm and lovingly said to her, Are we going to have going to have any problems here?! And the fear of God choking on her fright she soflty said, "No" I said, "Good, HI my name is Connie and she said no its not it's Dr. Yerian!"
author: Connie Savage

comment: Johnny, sorry this is SOOO deeep...but here goes...over the past week or so now that I have been watching all of this finally, I have also seen my daughter in the midst of all this insanity in the recorded conversations between you and this deranged behavior of your X and I immediately saw my daughter whom has bipolar and depression and anxiety attacks and is a LIVING NIGHTMARE to go through and I see a massive part of that too here with her as well...and I know how explosive 💣 they can be and argumentative and controlling and manipulates and God help ya if they don't get their wayyyy they can become very very violent and destructive HOWEVER THEY CAN CONTROL THAT TO A DEGREE AND NOT TAKE IT OUT ON PEOPLE but throw their fits when they have these meltdowns and flare ups that can literally be EXPLOSIVE and for that I am truly sorry for the both of you having to be dealing with something they have no control over at all and I can hear and see it in my daughter and CONSTANTLY battling to defuse her tizzzzys my daughter gets into, SO I can once again SYMPATHIZE with you and totally know what you've been through there with that too, my daughter is now 20 yrs and YESSSS I do warn her friends and boyfriends of these meltdowns she has and she refuses help and therapy and meds... SOOO my hands are full and NEVER know when the UGLY VILE MADNESS will erupt and it's out of the blue most of the time and very hard to live with for them with these disorders...BUT I KNOW as for the mean nasty destroy you and your reputation was a DILIBERATELY on PURPOSE thing that HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH the any mental issues your X may have...TRUST ME If my daughter had done something to physically HARM someone as badly as you were when your finger got injured my daughter would have come unglued from hurting someone and fought tooth and nail to be by their side and gone down kicking and screaming ENDLESSLY How sorry she would be that that happened SOOO while your X was LIVID over the prenuptial paper that started the whole thing that led to your hand being severed off I KNEW IMMEDIATELY she was nothing more than in love with your pocket book not our Johnny's heart and your finger and tho she made a few comments here n there about you she wasn't reacting in any wayyy a TRUE HEART THAT LOVES SOMEONE would be acting! Therefore in the midst of all this I knew EVERYTHING SHE DESCRIBING SHE DESCRIBING HERSELF AND A NARCISSISTIC RAGED OUT OF CONTROL COLD HEARTED PERSON! And Our Johnny was too in love to see who and what she was and after! I wish her no ill will Johnny and truly soo sorry for the endless battlefields you were in and going through with her! My heart just break and bleeds CUZZ I KNOW what and where you have been through and words can't begin to say how truly very sorry for all you went through with her Hun! Prayers are with you for a speedy recovery and healing BUT once again there is NOTHING like God to get you through this difficult time and leaning on him! I know I've been through ALOT and I wouldn't be who I am without Him holding me together and getting me through the hell I've been through and pray you find Him and can find yourself too leaning on the ever lasting arms of Jesus too to hold you and make it all better and find peace and joy and happiness that surpasses all understanding My Dear Friend Johnny! ❤️ ❣️

comment: Johnny, prayers are with you and though I have seen in the last day or two now I see you are Gemini to as I am as well, (May 27, 1965) and that you think of yourself as an Athiest and don't believe in what I am about to share with you, from the first news of your injured finger found myself praying ALOT for you and for God's protection to be watching over you and to be with you and help you...I still do and THANK GOD he got you through this ALIVE SAFE AND WELL from the DV my friend! But let me share this with you IF YOU AND I THINK what we went through was HELLL in our relationships with the abuse from our mates well Hun, Our ETERNAL DESTINATION after this life is over IS NOTHING and this abuse was just a walk down a rough road and path we were dealt, AND HELL IS GOING TO BE magnified thousand folds times over to a place there won't ever be any relief and pray you find yourself one day reading the Holy Bible The King James Version IS BEST and comes the closest to translating the Bible from Hebrew and Greek languages it was written in originally and pray God gives you an open mind and wisdom seeking out truth of God before you sign your life to simply not believing in God Our Heavenly Father Hun and spending an eternity in a place fsr separated from Heaven and God and not knowing that we were born in sin and sinners unrepented will spend their final destination and eternity in a place called Hell instead of a Heavenly place called Heaven...John 3:16 "For God SOOO Loved the World That He Gave His Only Begotten Son (Jesus Christ To Die on The Cross for ALL OF US TO Forgive Us of Our Sins and that we may be saved if we ask Him To Come Into Our Lives and Live our Lives for Him and not for ourselves) That Whosoever Believeth In Me Shall Not Perish BUT Have Everslating Life" and when this life is over IT IS NOT ETERNAL DEATH MY friend and I just pray that you will find God and Jesus Christ and if you ever want to listen to some AWESOME MESSAGES UTube/Facebook Amir Tsarfati in Behold Israel 🇮🇱 and listen to some AWESOME GODLY TEACHERS/LEADERS! ❤️ ❣️ I tell you this cuz I CARE ABOUT YOU AND YOUR ETERNAL DESTINATION My friend! ❤️ ❣️ God Blesssss and I pray God be with you and show you the wayyy to Heaven and can't wait to meet finally meet you at the Pearly Gate of Heaven one day! ❤️ ❣️

comment:
To those who talk, especially in regards to Johnny, about celebrities having all of these material things to spend their time on in quarantine and not having the right to say it is a difficult time for them, you are misunderstanding the true meaning of "difficult". Difficult does not always mean monetary needs, nor does it always mean not having food to eat or a roof over your head. One can face hard times no matter how rich or poor they are. I suggest you listen to the song Johnny is promoting here, "Isolation", whether you listen to Johnny and Jeff's, or John Lennon's, take note of the text: "People say we've got it made, don't they know we're so afraid?" 

Celebrities have money, they have every physical thing they could possibly desire, but I've found that more often than not, the more material things you own, the less spiritual rest you have. Johnny has just been through the worst emotional trauma of his life. His wife who he loved and wanted to trust wreaked havoc in his entire world. She destroyed things he held dear, and I'm not talking about a $30,000 bottle of wine or a million dollar penthouse. I'm talking about his trust in anyone he will meet from here on out, his understanding of love and friendship, the reputation he worked to build himself, his privacy, his integrity, the list goes on. 

Being isolated while his trial against this serial abuser is put on hold is probably very very hard for him. No amount of money can fill the kind of hole that pain leaves. Quit the shortsighted mindset that people with money have no problems. I'm poor, but hell I even understand that you can't buy peace of mind. It doesn't work that way.

comment: No one is perfect. And every relationship has has problems. But this man has had to live out his personal tragedies in the  glaring spotlight. His personal life is not my business. I don't know him personally and never will. But I know his work and I love his talent. He is one of my absolute favorite entertainers. He is beyond brilliant. He is said to be a humble and kind man who appreciates life. I believe this. He is different and quirky and belongs to himself. I admire and respect that. I'm sorry for what has happened to him. A bunch. Of lazy, greedy people saw a free ride and took it. Shame on them all. He spent too much money? It's his to spend. He drinks too much? He's a grown man. None of it is my business. I will not watch the next Pirates  movie. The role is his. His heart and soul. He created it. No one else can do it. Shame on Disney for being weak and manipulated. I'm 60 and have seen a bit of life. His personal life is not his talent. They are mutually exclusive. I might not like him if I met him or he me. I will never know. But I respect him as a person, admire his individuality and enjoy his gift. Live and let live. Until he gives me a reason not to I support him. I just do. I just will. And there it is.

comment:
(Johnny Depp's Instagram Post in Korean:  translation by Inki Welch)
여러분 안녕하세요!  이 방송을 지상에서 받을수 있는 그 누구든지 제 안부 전합니다.  SNS세계속의 경험은 제겐 처음입니다.  한번도 해본적도 없거니와 여짓껏 해볼 아무런 이유도 절때 느끼지 않았습니다. 허나 눈에 보이지 않는 적의 위협으로 인해 이미 수많은 사람들에게 비참한 비극이 안겨졌고 사람들의 삶에 막대한 손해가 끼쳐있는 지금은 우리가 대화를 나눌 때라 여겨집니다.  수많은 사람들이 보살핌없이 병들어 있고, 숨에 헐떡이는 투병을 하고, 무섭게 높은 비율로 사망하고, 이 끔찍한 세계적인 유행병으로 인해 사람들이 자녀들과 식구들을 부양 할수없게 됬었고, 누구는 유일한 직업을 잃고 많은 자들이 오랜 세월속에서 노고로 열심히 성장 시켰던 사업들이 망하고 있습니다.  또한 대수의 자들이 길거리에서 보호없이, 자가격리 할 옵션도 없이 노숙자로 헤메고 있습니다. 그러므로 우리가 이 어두운 시간과 힘들때 사랑하는 사람들, 커뮤니티, 우리 자신, 세상과 우리의 미래를 위해 서로를 도와야합니다.  

당장은 우리의 양손이 등뒤에 묶여있는것 같이 느껴지며 어느 정도까지는 그렇다  인정합니다.  허나 우리의 생각은 자유롭고 우리의 마음은 쇠사슬에 묶여있지 않으며 우리는 서로를 돌볼수가 있고 돌봄으로 우리는 이길수 있습니다. 배려는 우리 눈앞에 있기에 보길 원한다면 항상 우리 앞에 놓여져 있습니다.  괜찮으시다면 제가 독담하듯 여기까지 어떻게 와 있는지 설명해 드릴테니 시간을 좀 내주시길 바랍니다.  우리에게 나눠진 카드로 인해 자가격리의 시간을 보낼 방법들을 찾고있는 많은 분들께 조언을 드릴까 해서 여러분들께서 호의적인 메세지 하나 더 견디실수 있다면 말씀 드리겠습니다.

우선적으로 그 무엇보다도 안전하게 건강하게 그리고 가내에서 무탈히 지내시길 바랍니다. 우리의 극심한 상황을 불구하고 가급적 최대의 시간을 사랑하는 사람들과 함께 보내는것이 필요합니다. 지옥같은 자가격리의 단조함에 굴복해서 악화 되지않고 포기하지 않으며 자가격리의 시간을 잘 이용해 훌륭한 것들을 배워 우리의 호기심을 채울 필요가 있습니다. 오늘은 오늘이라는 것을 기억하시길요. 오늘을 놓치므로 내일 오늘에 대한 환불이란 없습니다. 오늘은 절대 돌아오지 않으니까요. 그러기에 서로에게 책임감을 갖고 이 자가격리 시간을 새로운 대책으로 접근 하시길요. 뭔가를 만드세요. 내일 우리와 다른 사람들에게 혜택이 될수있는 뭔가를 오늘 만드십시오.  다른 누구의 날을 밝게 해줄수 있는것을 고안 해보시길요.

우리 아이들이 어렸을때 제게와서 “아빠, 나 심심해. 아주 지루해요.”라고 말 할때가 종종 있었지만 제 반응은 항상 같았습니다:  “따분함은 절대 용납 않된다.  너희들은 절대 지루하면 않되” 라고요. 항상 할수있는 그 무언가가 있기에. 언제든. 그림, 독서, 페인팅, 묵상, 학습, 셀카로 영상 제작, 연주, 연주 못하면 연주 배우기, 악기가 없다면 악기를 만드십시오.  집안에 소리낼수 있는 물건들이 아주 많으니 소리들을 발견해서 녹음하고 소음들을 겹쳐서 곡을 만드세요. 그것들이 바로 음악입니다. 물론 이웃이 화를 내겠지만 그냥 소리를 내십시오.  곡목표를 만들어 다른 사람들과 교환하고, 새 음악을 듣고, 오래된 음악도 들으며 여러분이 익숙지 않은 음악도 감상해 보시길요.  제 영원한 약점은 컨츄리 블루스입니다.  썬 하우스, 북카 화잇트, 로버트 좐슨에 대해 전  항상 사족을 못씁니다.  머리를 항상 분주하게 돌리시며 이 상황을 우리 함께 벗어납시다.

하여간 여러분들과 제 일상생활로 돌아가기 이전에, 절친이자 의형제인 제프와 제가 여러분들과 공유할것이 있습니다.  지난 2년간 오래된
기타 명인의 일인인 제프 벡과 함께 앨범을 녹음 할수있는 대단한 영광을 갖게 되서 작년 아님 일년 반전에 제프와 함께 이 노래를 녹음했습니다.  ‘아이솔레이션’ (‘고립’)이란 곡이에요.  절묘한 좐 레논의 노래를 편집 한것입니다.  레논의 예언적인 언어들이 순수한 시이죠. 제프와 저는 레논의 심오한 가사가 현제 현상되는 일과 적합하다고 여겼습니다.  이 노래는 우리 세계에 대한 고립, 두려움과 존재에 관련된 위기에 대한 것이기에 저희가 이 노래를 여러분들께 받치기로 했습니다.  우리가 체험하고 있는 이 비상시에 조금이라도 도움이 되길 진심으로 바라지만 그냥 이 고립된 시간을 함께 보낼수 있게 도움이 된다면 더 할나위가 얿습니다.

여러분 모두가 안전하고 완벽함에 둘러 쌓여 있으며 조만간 빠른 기일 내 뵙길 희망합니다. 끝까지 들어 주셔서 매우 고맙습니다. 그리고 끝마치기 전에 한가지 개인적으로 말씀 드릴께 있는데..  지난 수년간 저에 대한 모든 여러분의 배려와 여러분의 변함없는 지지와 여러분의 격려에 깊히 감사드립니다.  더 말할 나위없이 감동 받았습니다.  대략 이쯤이에요.  저희 버전인 좐 레논의 아이솔레이션을 부디 즐기시길 바랍니다.  매우 감사하며  앞으로 더 많은 것을 공유하리라 예상합니다. 그러니 여러분들을 앞으로 다시 보길 기약하며 그때까지 안녕히 계십시오. 바이.
author: Inki Welch

comment:
We love you as well dear, Johnny,  you deserve a much better life, also. We all hope you find your soul mate. Some kind generous and understanding of the depth of that human soul of yours.  A lady that inspires you to dream that dream again.   I have lost my business, after so many year's of hard work paying high taxes ect. I  feel for my dear employees! Man I  love them so much. I am  nothing without the love of humanity! I think of all the  other's who have lost , and I  hear the crying! I have all ways been in tune. As a female business owner,  a welding company.  I was a talented horse rider and played many instruments.  But I left behind to have a family. I lost my husband 49, its been very difficult.  But my faith in God and the human soul.has carried me thru so far.  Its been a Very dark time, coming. Its been barried far to long. These unthinkable thing's have slowly headed that way for year's.  Because such horrendous greed! When there's truly plenty for all. We humans are simply priceless ! To think of being tricked and lied to by those we have trusted most, our leaders. Let's hope the deep dark corruption is not winning To trick and brainwash over a buck. Is unthinkable! As you know as well, it's intolerable! Now longer is slavery acceptable! Love is our only answer! Thruth Knowledge ,Equality peace for all!  Well I believe fate will handle those few in charge of our great race awakens. Out of this storm will come a beautiful better world, is my prayers of hope and thoughts. Thanks for taking the time to reach out. 
We are so praying,  Love is our only answer. Thank you dearest soul Thank you infinte for your words. And your talents. It's time for our lost hidden knowledge to come forth .Remember your people love you, infinitely! Remember that. I had heard year's ago, that was your dream to have a band. And you got a detour to film. Music is so inlighting and heals the soul. Its universal! I hope you do your music in the right frequencies!   Good luck God speed! Am simply an old fan of your talent! Love you infinitely

comment:
Thanks Johnny I've know of u from ur first bashful smile on telly ! I  I've kept up with u when I can. Haven't had a reply in few years...too poor! I want to thank you for posting your kind comments for everyone who needed those kind words...I needed them. Feb 28th,2020 my neighbors son lit a bed a blaze. Needless to say we lost everything. I have an autistic son an we are homeless. We were living above a "church".
   Now we are living in a seeded motel in Baltimore. An pandemic or not if we can't pay their kicking us out or lo k us outta our Rm away from our personal things. My son is regressing. Feb 28 was 5 days away from the year anniversary of the arson fire we barely survived march 4th.2019. We lost my son's therapy Dog Bella girl... she couldn't find him so she was found on our bed.
    But Johnny ur a good guy an old school like me.. Again thanks for cheering ppl like me on with ur kind words an music. I m enjoying free wifi tonight!
    Love an light to you an yours luv!
  Stay safe an sound!!!

comment:
Johnny's a very distant relative on my maternal side (Adkins). Found that out maybe two years ago. Been a fan since the 80's. He takes a lot of shit from people, especially guys (ego). He reminds me of me in a lot of ways, after finding out we're distantly related, it made more sense. I've never been jealous of him, more jealous (though not really) that a close friend has met him once or twice (female). 

I've been a longtime Jeff Beck fan and was surprised when he started showing up onstage with him. Quickly messaging my friend video links. What brought me here was just my laughing at the guys making shit posts about him. It's always the guys. Unwarranted, but how it is. 

Stay safe and blessings, 

Stephen

comment: Thx Johnny Depp, 4 ur touching words and being as real as u could be. I don't do much social media either; too much hate, weirdness. U have endured much criticism last few yrs (after the personal, legal stuff) Even I, a long time big admirer of ur work, began to question who u were as a person. I still think u are who I imagined u would be as a normal you, day to day. This 8 min chat let me know ur doingbfine, ur heart appears to be solid and in the best place it could be. I heard the BRILLIANT version of Lennon's Isolation yesterday, and stopped what I was doing after 3 seconds. U and Jeff Beck, guitar God who I have sat in front of couple times. Finally, someone LET U SING! U sound wonderful vocally, and mimic John nicely, but sound just like you. I want a lot more of the musical Johnny Depp (not the Vampire's stuff, which I don't like at all) Keep urself vocally and instrumentally up front w/ great ppl, like Jeff Beck. U don't belong hiding as a sideman. U are a complete talent, so let's have MORE MUSIC like this track! U seem to have ur heart and head in a good place, so God bless ya. stay healthy, Keep it up w/some ofvthat 'ol blues too, lotta ppl still love that. Peace and health 2 u and all.Thx much!

comment:
I (like many) have had a deep respect and admiration Johnny Depp for almost as long as I can remember. I know just what he's been going through (I was with an abusive partner for ten years, and I've never really recovered in all the years since it ended) my heart goes out to him. When women abuse men the psychological damage is often as bad (or worse) than the physical harm caused, but unfortunately we live in a world where female abusers (and what they do) arent really taken seriously. In fact the men abused at the hands of women are often made to be the butt of jokes and a source or ridicule. I'm so happy the truth is coming to light and this terrible injustice is being taken seriously. I have more respect and love for Johnny than ever.
 Keep being the awesome guy I always knew you were,  you're a legend Johnny, don't let what's happened change you, or break you like it did me. Stay safe and well, and when the lockdown is over may the road come up to meet you mon ami 👌❤✌💪😷

comment: Hi Jonny, I'm Jana from Germany. I actually am experiencing this time as one of the most special and even beautiful times in my life so far. I'm feeling the love at home intensly, I'm working on my vacation (a Coaching Programm for fathers who want to re-build the lost relationship with their daughters), and I appreciate the sunshine, food, and the music from Spain (where I grew up) my thoughts and nature (we go for walks) in a special way. The world is changing, so do we. We all need to enjoy the present, it's all we have. I hope you stay healthy too, thank you for adressing this issue, and giving us positive thoughts. Love, Jana.

love it. spot on message. we are human BEINGS. we have come here to create  so all that exist is our creation. we can blame external situations on something or someone outside ourselves, without willing and escaping to look deeper inside in our own hearts, thoughts, words and actions. we can not create something beautiful out of this situation we find ourselves now, if we do not change within. expand the heart, expand the vision beyond what we think is possible because we are creators. if we can Invision individually and connect collectively on that level, we can recreate the structure of our existence we have been experiencing so far. this is the time of individual and collective change. these is superiors or less worthy. evaluation of of the reason why we are all here. what is the purpose of existing? surely it is more than just living and breathing. more then just consuming and critisizing. maybe now when we are in lockdown in our "boxes" we will look at the nature with new appreciation. maybe we will see now that nature can survive without us, bet we can not survive without nature.

but, yea, love to Jhonny Depp ♥️
he's the Man ♥️🙏👌

comment:
He speaks with wisdom, he's met some interesting characters in his life, worked with them, portrayed them... It definitely shows in how his mind works. "There are gonna be no refunds tomorrow for having missed today." Having said that, there will be countless people that listen to his message, call it deep, call it inspiring or whatever, but will not soak it up. This virus presents humanity with an opportunity for change, to make the world better, to better ourselves. For the people who are complaining about this saying "wahh he's just another celebrity telling us what to do" blah blah.... Perhaps if we stop concerning ourselves over what others are doing to help the world and ask ourselves what WE can do, the world would be a better place. Your argument about celebrities using tragedy for their own personal gains goes right out the window when you, yourself, choose to spend your time during the tragedy to spread negativity, to win arbitrary likes in meaningless arguments on the internet against people you'll never even speak to again. It's hypocritical. 
 
 Anyway, well said Johnny Depp, a thought provoking message i hope more people will take on board.

comment:
This is an outstanding video. Johnny has stayed quiet. But then chose the best way possible to connect or reconnect with his fans in a clear and heartfelt way that we all know is Mr. Johnny Christopher Depp II. He reached out with words of encouragement, and ideas of what to do while stuck at home. He encouraged us to love and care for each other.(what a concept?) He asked us to share his love of music and to hear it his way....just to see what we might think. And he thanked those who have supported him, stood by him in our thoughts and messages in a way that was kind and gentlemanly. No drama. Just a "thank you" and how much that support has meant to him. He doesn't NEED to say why. We all already know why. 
I don't know Johnny. But, I have watched enough interviews, meets and greets, blooper/gag videos etc to feel that this is Johnny right to the core. Johnny "unplugged" if you will?  What a really special video from the heart. And Loved, loved, loved the candles. ;) 
Take Care Everyone! Stay safe. ;)
Although, I thought it was kind if funny that he said he was "seemingly" talking to himself.  Isn't that what he does for a living, talk to cameras? lol lol 
Still raise a glass to Johnny for a great video and message! 
Thanks so much J. Depp. So happy to

comment: It's a great video. I am very glad to see him doing well. He is such a private person that I think this post came as a complete surprise to everyone. Not only is he thanking everyone for their support, he's made a social media account to thank them, and not saying it through the movie industry as other celebrities would have done. He felt the need to say thank you on a personal level. I think it speaks volumes about him as a person. He also offers us some excellent and very sound advice about being in isolation. It comes from his heart because he truly cares about people. He's quite an amazing man, with tons of inner strength and courage. His video is heartwarming and it made me smile. I also love the whole cozy, homey atmosphere with the candles. :)  Keep safe everyone.

You know, we are in confinement for a month now and officially for another one, so even if I'm not a go out kind of person, it's getting a bit long... I'm playing way too much video games lol but it's not enough to cover some worries I have like my brother and his wife working in 2 different hospitals... and also you obv.
Since the lockdown, there is a 'show' live on tv on dinner time, where a chef from home cook simple recipes  with people on skype and for everyone to do at the same time at home, it's really good and it's  also used to collect money for the medical staff. ^^  Food, fun and kindness at the same time! ^^
Thanks for the video.

author: Charlotte Jenniffer Domingo

comment:
I loved the message. Made me a bit nostalgic. 

I remember being just a girl (young, can't remember the age for the life of me) but I remember telling my dad to take me outside cause I was bored. It was raining so obviously we couldn't do anything:))anyway he said what do you mean bored? Took my hand and took to the living room where 2/4walls were covered entirely with books. And said pick one. I said I didn't like reading. He took me back to the kitchen and started making dinner. My mom joined us and he started telling us a story about 15 boys lost at sea. And each night at dinner he would continue the story where he left off the day before. I loved it! Until one day, he stopped. I asked him to tell me what happened to the boys in his story and he quietly went to the bookshelf in the living room and brought me "two years' vacation" by jules verne and said "you want to find out? Here, read it yourself and tell me every night at dinner about the progress you made. I am old and forgot. Could you remind me?". I loved reading ever since..

No time to get bored...so much to do,see, read, learn, play,love...

Thank you Johnny for the heartwarming message and for bringing back such a lovely memory:) hope you are all safe:)
